pantry.name: Pavlova
pantry.description: Named after the legendary Russian ballerina Anna Pavlova, this meringue-based dessert is known for its crisp exterior and soft, marshmallow-like interior. This cake is a cherished Christmas tradition particularly in Australia and New Zealand.
pantry.question: Which ingredients do you need to make the lovely Pavlova?

pantry.name: Cake AB
pantry.description: Cake AB has been around since the middle ages
pantry.question: How to make cake AB?
